pageProduct.name: Ostevit-D Children's Oral Drops 15ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

OsteVit-D Vitamin D3 Children's Drops helps develop teeth and healthy bones and supports healthy immune system function. The pleasant butterscotch flavoured liquid is colour free and contains no added sugar.

OsteVit-D Vitamin D3 Children's Drops 15mL contains 187 doses of Vitamin D3 400IU per bottle. It is suitable for infants and children aged 0-12 years.

For easy use, the integrated dropper within the bottle will automatically dispense one drop containing 200IU when tipped at a 45° degree angle.

Size: 15ml

KEY FEATURES

• • Enhances calcium absorption
• • Helps develop teeth & maintain strong bones
• • Supports healthy immune system function
• • Aids muscle development & supports muscle function
• • All-in-one easy to use dropper
• • No added: Sugar, Gluten, Yeast, Gelatin, Artificial colours, Lactose, Starch, Wheat, Soy, Egg, shellfish

Warnings

" Vitamins can only be of assistance if dietary vitamin intake is inadequate.
Contains Sodium benzoate."

Ingredients

butylated hydroxytoluene, citric acid, dibasic sodium phosphate heptahydrate, dl-alpha-tocopherol, Flavour, glycerol, polysorbate 80, purified water, sodium benzoate, sucralose, vegetable oil

Active Ingredients: Contains Vitamin D3 400IU (10 micrograms colecalciferol) per 0.08mL

Directions

Infants and children up to 12 years of age: Two drops daily or as directed by youor healthcare professional.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 25°C
